sentences.english: Some authors should be paid by the quantity NOT written.
sentences.chinese: 某些作者，應該按他們沒有寫下的分量來付稿費。

sentences.english: Beauty shes want to use earn fees to transfer, but for political huan huan is not politics.
sentences.chinese: 美妍想用賺到的稿費幫政桓換車，但政桓不要。

sentences.english: He wasn't paid for it, but still, one editor had praised his work.
sentences.chinese: 沒有稿費，但他的作品受到一名編輯的讚揚。

sentences.english: And the price was splendid, even though it was for the poem of a century.
sentences.chinese: 即使這首詩可稱世紀之作，稿費也還是很高的。

sentences.english: I'm using my new book advance to pay fancy decorator.
sentences.chinese: 我已經提前把新書的稿費付裝修費了。

sentences.english: For the next year Jo continued to write these stories and earn money.
sentences.chinese: 接下來的一年，喬寫作不輟，賺取稿費。

definition: to read and pass on/to pass on for perusal
to pay in advance/to get payment in advance
variant of 答覆|答复[da2 fu4]
to fall into a trap/taken in by a stratagem/cheated/ripped off
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
to worry/to fret/to be anxious/to become sad
